name: Tomb Of Pharaohs - DEMO - v0.5.1 BETA
name_original: Tomb Of Pharaohs - DEMO - v0.5.1 BETA
description:
Here is the first DEMO for Tomb of Pharaohs!

Disclaimer : This game is currently being developed and is only intended to show the concept.  While it can be played, there are many elements missing or unfinished and you may run into some bugs!

Use the "Arrow Keys" or "WSAD" to get your character moving, he will continue moving along that direction until he hits a wall or you change direction.

The levels are randomly generated and get bigger as you level up.  Different sections of the maze will unlock at different levels increasing the complexity and pace of the game.  Some of the sections planned are;

Swinging axes; Booby traps in treasure rooms; Holes in the floor to jump over; Scorpions to attack; Mummies to attack; Spikes in the floor; Shooting arrows between passage ways; Fast closing doors; Puzzle doors to unlock short cuts; and walls closing in.

Collect all the artefacts for bonus XP, collect the chests for coins, and collect all the keys to unlock the door to the pharaohs tomb!  Fight the pharaoh by using the "Space-Bar" to pass the level!

If you manage to collect everything and explore 100% of the level you will receive bonus XP and bonus coins!

Coins can be spent in the main menu on upgrading the amount of coins chests give you, or upgrade the amount of extra time that perks give you or upgrade the amount of extra points you can get!

Would love to hear any feedback you can offer!
